title: The GDPR's Rules on Data Breaches: Analysing Their Rationales and Effects
summary: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) requires an organisation that suffers a data breach to notify the competent Data Protection Authority. The organisation must also inform the relevant individuals, when a data breach threatens their rights and freedoms. This paper focuses on the following question: given the goals of the GDPR's data breach notification obligation, and we assess the obligation in the light of those goals.
